import * as C from './styles' import {Theme} from '../../components/Theme/intex' import {FormActions, useForm} from '../../context/FormContext' import {useEffect} from 'react' import {useHistory} from 'react-router-dom' import { EmailShareButton, FacebookShareButton, LinkedinShareButton, RedditShareButton, TwitterShareButton, WhatsappShareButton, } from "react-share"; export const FormStep4 = () => { const {state, dispatch} = useForm() const history = useHistory() useEffect(() => { if (state.name === '') { history.push('/') } else { dispatch({ type: FormActions.setCurrentStep, payload: 4 }) } }, []) return (
